channel.title: Error Connecting to server
channel.description: Why does it keep saying error connectiong to server? no matter what server i go into, it says the same thing. and it gives me something like this " Your UID is: 47558433" with a different number everytime it say "Error Connecting to server." someone help plz? :confused:

item.title: Error Connecting to server
item.dc:creator: @blackbelt1400 blackbelt1400
item.description:
@blackbelt1400 wrote:

satesql:

He’s not running his own server, hes trying to get on others. Well yeah that’s why you can’t log on, and if you take the effort when you get back and read this, you need to either use silab or the client they have.

Exactly, I’m trying to join other people on their servers and play with groups on a different hosts server, the above post, to be honest, confused the hell out of me, but I realize you put alot of effort into putting that together and I thank you for it.I guess that’s lamens terms for alot of this stuff, thanks alot for trying to help, I’ll see if I can use it.

Read full topic

item.title: Error Connecting to server
item.dc:creator: @bhpkyeah satesql
item.description:
@bhpkyeah wrote:

He’s not running his own server, hes trying to get on others. Well yeah that’s why you can’t log on, and if you take the effort when you get back and read this, you need to either use silab or the client they have.

item.title: Error Connecting to server
item.dc:creator: @drask182 drask182
item.description:
@drask182 wrote:

same here…i try to run server put my ip on it saying this

Try Some1 Fix For Me This

Why…i had this problem…when i run my server i try to log in with my server ip it dosent load…

Here Some Picture With My Computer

No-ip.org

Cmd

Port




Wat Wrong With it?..when i run my 503 server and run frugoo 503 client it dosent load the client…but i have run it …

Read full topic

item.title: Error Connecting to server
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

[quote=“Luffy490, post:5, topic:226643”][quote author=dylan_0789 link=topic=297845.msg2393262#msg2393262 date=1219043321]
dont use your own client… some servers require you to use their client or silab. try using the client they offer, seeing as many servers are making their own client now.
[/quote] how do i that? i dont really know much about moparscape, im pretty new.[/quote]

Many people list a client download link under their server info page. so u download the client, extract it, and run it

Read full topic

item.title: Error Connecting to server
item.dc:creator: @blackbelt1400 blackbelt1400
item.description:
@blackbelt1400 wrote:

I just made an account so I could ask this same problem, I guess for now I’m a leecher, at least until I’ve created my own server, but I intend on posting here and helping other people with what minimal knowledge I have. I’ve been going over server tutorials for a while now, but I’ve yet to actually play on one I’m having the same problem as him, I’ve downloaded the latest version of Mopar w/Aryan, and I can occasionally play by myself on that one, but alot of the time I get this same connection error. I’ve also gone into the Server Status list and tried clicking Play on low detail on those, but I get the same error. Is there something I need to download? An IP/port I need to plug in? Thanks in advance, didn’t want to double post this issue. Looking forward to posting more soon

Blackbelt1400

Read full topic
